attributes.action:
EU REFERENDUM BADLY FLAWED
so NO MANDATE FOR ANY BREXIT
so REVOKE ARTICLE 50
attributes.additional_details:
Irish and Commonwealth, but not most EU, citizens in UK  INCLUDED but many UK citizens, even taxpayers, in EU EXCLUDED  - all also likely much affected. "Votes for Life" also in Tory Manifesto but lost in rush for a quick result. Young people also excluded.

LORDS Report 2009 UK Referendums - Significant drawbacks! Too often tactical. Stress good public information provision if to be fairly debated. Commend use of independent body.

Divided Party = easy tactical job/result not as hoped = FIASCO
attributes.background:
General Election FRANCHISE totally wrong for Referendum on UK/EU relationship. Scrutinised, debated and agreed by Parliament but still wrong. Special franchise needed. This is not about legalities but relevance, principle and common sense.

INFORMATION meagre for proper assessment of arguments.
